segments.text: I see the boy climbing up on the stool, reaching for the cookies with such determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel the tension as the stool wobbles beneath him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a mischievous moment, filled with excitement as he stretches up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how much he must want those cookies, yet the risk is so apparent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way he holds the plate is both clever and risky; he is trying to be resourceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m amazed at his balance, but I worry he might slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a reckless act, but it’s also a reminder of childhood joy.
segments.speaker: PAR
